items.desc: Aisle Security researchers demonstrate responsible AI vulnerability disclosure, detailing what effective AI security research methodology looks like in practice.
Security researcher Connor McGarr reveals a privilege escalation technique in Windows via ETW's SecurityTrace flag, exposing nuanced internals of Windows privilege management.
Researchers discover that Claude's internal refusal 'magic string' can be exploited to disrupt LLM-powered workflows, highlighting a novel AI denial-of-service attack vector.
Coinbase details how it uses Multi-Party Computation (MPC) encryption to protect personally identifiable information, offering a technical deep dive into consumer data security.
Proofpoint acquires Acuvity to address emerging security risks posed by agentic AI systems, expanding its enterprise security portfolio.
Palo Alto Networks acquires Koi Security to strengthen its agentic AI endpoint protection capabilities as AI-driven threats accelerate.
Reports reveal a senior Saudi official implicated in a Twitter espionage plot is included in the delegation accompanying Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman on a US visit.
Isomorphic Labs unveils its Drug Design Engine, a breakthrough AI platform that goes beyond AlphaFold to accelerate drug discovery and molecular design.
Lenny Rachitsky's newsletter explores how product managers can develop AI product intuition, covering frameworks for evaluating AI-driven product decisions.
Dream Launch Studio offers a rapid prototyping platform for product teams, with pricing models designed to accelerate early-stage product development.
comma.ai shares the technical and financial journey of building and owning a $5M data center, offering rare insight into self-hosted AI infrastructure at scale.
Hadrian Security open-sources Subwiz, a lightweight GPT-based model fine-tuned specifically for automated subdomain discovery in attack surface management.
